categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Zephyr Base, best known as the Rebel Outpost, was a Rebel military outpost on Rori.
Although Rori was controlled by the Galactic Empire, the Alliance has managed to make the outpost a small but effective base on the moon.
After the Battle of Yavin, it was attacked by a unit of storm commandos, who found information there regarding Rebel sympathizers among the Royal Naboo Security Forces.
Alliance members present on the base in 1 ABY included Booto Lubble, General Ufwol, Raxa Binn and Commander Vordin Sildor.

Zephyr Base was one of three starports on Rori in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. On the maps it was only called "a Rebel Outpost" or "Rebel Military Outpost". The name "Zephyr Base" was mentioned by Raxa Binn, one of the Non-Player Characters at the base.
